attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Now that the EU has graciously decided to allow us to keep traditional Imperial measures, the Government should now completely abandon all attempts at converting us to Metric.

There is absolutely nothing wrong with using feet, inches, pints and miles (The Americans sent men to the Moon with it) and the vast majority of British people still use it.

Ask the average Briton his/her height or weight and they will most likely tell you in feet and inches, stones and pounds.

It's what we know. It's what we're used to.

We ask the Prime Minister to abandon the Metric system that so many of us find confusing and difficult to use.
